# Battle of Kızıl Tepe

| place             = near Kars
| result            = Ottoman victory
| combatant1        =
| combatant2        =
| commander1        = Mikhail Loris-MelikovZakhary ChavchavadzeArshak Ter-GukasovFerdinand von Sayn-Wittgenstein-Berleburg
| commander2        = Ahmed Muhtar Pasha
| strength1         = 35,000 infantry5,000 cossacks
| strength2         = 35,000 infantry12,000 cavalry354 guns
| casualties1       = Around 3,000 killed and wounded
| casualties2       = 430 killed1,400 wounded
}}
The Battle of Kizil-tepe () was fought on August 25, 1877, between the Russian Empire and the Ottoman Empire. The Russian were attempting to besiege Kars. The Ottomans, vastly superior in numbers, successfully lifted the siege.
